roles.name: Contractor

agenda_items.description: Can start work in the next 3 months
Project will take at least 2 years to complete

roles.name: Property Owner
roles.bio: Owner of several large apartment buildings

agenda_items.description: Is paid for by private investors
Benefits are local, with no profit for global corporations
Increase health and welfare for middle and lower class people
